drupalNodeEvent.title: Early Career Workshop I: COVID and the Tenure Track Market

field_speakers.processed: Professor David Fedman (UC Irvine), Professor Emma Yu Zhang (Hong Kong Polytechnic University), Professor Jack Meng-Tat Chia (National University of Singapore), Professor Todd Klaiman (Langara College)

field_organizers.processed: Graduate Student Association for Asian Studies (GSAAS), Brown University

field_description.processed: To help graduates prepare for the current pandemic uncertainties, we will set up a series of online workshops inviting young scholars who are in their stage of early career to share experiences with graduate students. The inaugural one will soon be held on 3/18 Thursday at 9 pm EST. For this panel, we invite four junior scholars across Singapore, Hong Kong, the US, and Canada to share personal trajectories in entering their current position as an assistant professor.
